title: Authors and Citation
text: Ou J (2023). vcf2r: Load VCF File R. R package version 1.2.
code: @Manual{,   title = {vcf2r: Load VCF File in R},   author = {Jen-Hsiang Ou},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 1.2}, }

title: Load VCF File in R
text: SAMtools need installed using package. package tested UNIX-like system (Linux MacOS). Windows users, may able use Windows Subsystem Linux (WSL), tested.

title: Load VCF File in R
text: Linux user, can install SAMtools following provided instructions. Mac users can install using source file via Homebrew using script. Verify software installed correctly.

title: Load VCF File in R
text: package submitted CRAN; thus, may install GitHub.

what: Read single variant from VCF file to R. — read_line
title: Read single variant from VCF file to R. — read_line
text: Read single variant block zipped VCF file R.

title: Read single variant from VCF file to R. — read_line
code: read_line(VCF, chr = NULL, pos = NULL, infoOnly = TRUE)

title: Read single variant from VCF file to R. — read_line
text: VCF Path target block zipped VCF file (*.vcf.gz) chr chromosome wanted read. Whole VCF file loaded default. pos specific positions wanted load target chromosome. infoOnly load variant information. Default: TRUE. Use FALSE want load genotype data.

title: Read single variant from VCF file to R. — read_line
text: VCF file read data frame format

what: Read VCF file to R. — read_vcf
title: Read VCF file to R. — read_vcf
text: Read block zipped VCF file R.

title: Read VCF file to R. — read_vcf
code: read_vcf(VCF, chr = NULL, from = NULL, to = NULL, infoOnly = TRUE)

title: Read VCF file to R. — read_vcf
text: VCF Path target block zipped VCF file (*.vcf.gz) chr chromosome wanted read. Whole VCF file loaded default. specific region wanted load target chromosome. specific region wanted load target chromosome. infoOnly load variant information. Default: TRUE. Use FALSE want load genotype data.
